name: Bernice
description: Hello, my name's Bernice and I'm a games concept artist! I like drawing whatever I want in my free time, especially red pandas.

name: 03rin
description:
Hello, everybody! My name is 03rin or Erin! I'm a science student and a hobbyist artist! You'll always see me drinking chai tea latte. ♥

I love to make illustrations filled with sparkles and love! Sometimes, I'll draw some ship art and fanart. Right now, I am currently taking commissions on digital couple illustrations, portraits, and chibis! ♥

Chat with me if you'd like! I love to play video games and watch anime/read manga! At the moment, I am into this video game, Great Ace Attorney, and this series, 86: Eighty-Six! ♥
